TranslatedText: 超级武器（玩家对战） v1.0.0

SourceText: Add Siege Camp in campaign as a superweapon for the game.\r\n\r\nThe Siege Camp is available at Imperial Age for 2000 wood, 2000 gold and 2000 stone. It comes with the Thunderous Barrage ability with a cost of 1000 stone and a cooldown of 150 seconds. Each player may build at most one Siege Camp.
TranslatedText: 将战役中的攻城营地作为超级武器添加到游戏中。\r\n攻城营地可以在帝王时代花费 2000 木材、2000 黄金和 2000 石料建造。它可以提供消耗 1000 石料并且冷却时间为 150 秒的雷霆轰炸技能。每位玩家最多只能建造一座攻城营地。
